website_summaries.verdict: Made primarily for inexperienced male players, as it has a lightweight design that’s not overly durable.
pros: Complete lacrosse stick with a high-quality head and pocket that’s good for players to learn how to control and throw the ball properly
Stick design excels in all kinds of weather conditions
Price is a little high, but product is quality-made
Has a tight shape in the head that helps with skill development
cons: Best for players who are developing their skills
not a stick that advanced men’s players will want to use

customer_reviews.title: Handheld coach
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have a 10 yr old that has been playing Lax since 3yrs old. Unfortunately he has picked up the bad habit of side arming, when throwing. This stick corrects him from throwing that way (because the ball will throw crazy)- which is a great thing because that gets him to think before he throws. All of the boys on his travel team just love this stick and the way it throws!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Keech

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome.
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this stick only a short time and made the comment that he wished he had this stick when he started playing lacrosse. It's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: S. Welbourne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described, and the seller was able to offer rushed delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like factory second?
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a factory second, can see why it’s on sale... Was expecting a uniform head and it seems like there is some fusing issues...
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Best stick....Best Price
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, Powerful and Beautiful....I could not be happier with this stick!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mogg

customer_reviews.title: Great stick with super pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great stick with super pocket. Great for beginners. Son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Krause

customer_reviews.title: Bardown Sports
customer_reviews.text: Stick was great for my son, but bar down sports was even better! Bar down was very helpful in n contacting warrior to get a new head coming to me after he cracked the head. Thanks again bardown!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this “used” for $68 but it came in perfect/new condition with tags on! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Great looking stick but it broke after one practice and half of a game. My son is 10 and plays half goal and half attack. His stick cracked in the middle of the game.
customer_reviews.author: KatieQ

customer_reviews.title: Good value for anyone
customer_reviews.text: As a coach, I buy a few of these every year so that players can borrow it and have a stick that works regardless of weather conditions, or bad stringing jobs. It is legal for high school play so I don't worry about stick check penalties with this stick.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Riecks

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his new stick! He has better control of the ball with it.
customer_reviews.author: Macbeck

customer_reviews.title: Cracked head after less than a month of use
customer_reviews.text: The head cracked after less than 30 days of use. $100 stick wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after first use. Meh. Tried emailing ppl. No response. Nothing
customer_reviews.author: marc baldwin

customer_reviews.title: best stick by far!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best stick for my son.He has been playing for three years and his stick handling got way better.This is the most trustworthy stick your sun can have.This is the only stick i will be getting him for a long time.And I mean it you should get it too.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Conley

product_meta.title: WARRIOR Evo WARP Next Complete Attack Lacrosse Stick - 2018
product_meta.description:
NEW VERSION WITH ALL WHITE POCKET!

The Warp Advantage.

Performance
Designed for the player under the age of 14 with a tighter face shape and an all-around pocket to refine stick skills.

Hassle Free
The WARP pocket doesn't need to be adjusted or broken in. It comes game ready - hassle and maintenance free.

Consistency
An unchanging, weather-resistant pocket means 100 percent confidence in how your stick will throw.


What is the most important part about learning to play lacrosse? Developing proper fundamentals. The Evo WARP Next provides a perfect pocket that has the optimal amount of whip, hold and playability for an entry to intermediate level lacrosse player. By removing the unpredictable characteristics of a hand strung head, the Evo WARP Next allows a developing player to concentrate on their fundamentals. No stringing and no effects from the weather, the Evo WARP Next comes game ready and will perform consistently off the shelf. Pick one up and work on your game, not your stick.
feature_bullets: Tighter face shape and all-around pocked to refine stick skills
